rows.label: campfev11_740_100_msg0001
rows.name: The time has finally come.

rows.label: campfev11_740_100_msg0002
rows.name: Yeah...

rows.label: campfev11_740_100_msg0003
rows.name:
Hugo, I'm sorry for
dragging you into this.

rows.label: campfev11_740_100_msg0004
rows.name: Don't worry about it.

rows.label: campfev11_740_100_msg0005
rows.name:
We can't just ignore the
Heaven's Holy Grail.

rows.label: campfev11_740_100_msg0006
rows.name:
Defeating him quickly is
in the best interest of the
Superbian Empire, too.

rows.label: campfev11_740_100_msg0007
rows.name:
Laura, I feel like I should
apologize to you, too.

rows.label: campfev11_740_100_msg0008
rows.name:
When we met by chance back in Felt
Village, I bet you never imagined
it would end up like this.

rows.label: campfev11_740_100_msg0009
rows.name: I definitely didn't, but... it's okay.

rows.label: campfev11_740_100_msg0010
rows.name:
Because I also believe
he must be defeated.

rows.label: campfev11_740_100_msg0011
rows.name:
In this short period of time, I've
encountered the many smiles of the
many people who live in Iira.

rows.label: campfev11_740_100_msg0012
rows.name: And I've met wonderful companions, too.

rows.label: campfev11_740_100_msg0013
rows.name:
I want to protect them,
too. The things that have
become precious to me.

rows.label: campfev11_740_100_msg0014
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: campfev11_740_100_msg0015
rows.name: I'm so moved, I could cry...

rows.label: campfev11_740_100_msg0016
rows.name: Hey, Adel!

rows.label: campfev11_740_100_msg0017
rows.name: I'm serious...

rows.label: campfev11_740_100_msg0018
rows.name: We'll definitely win this fight.

rows.label: campfev11_740_100_msg0019
rows.name: Right...

rows.label: campfev11_740_100_msg0020
rows.name: Of course!
